how-to-implement: in your meta.json - define *extended* with url to this (json) file - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cardanians/adapools.org/master/example-meta.json

company.name: eXtremely SECure Cardano ADA Staking Pool

about.me: We are certified DevSecOps engineers with over 20 years of experience managing highly available distributed systems. Passionate about web3 and decentralizacion of power.
about.server: XSEC staking pool runs in different datacenters distributed amongst Europe. We treat it as the most important highly available distributed system that we have ever managed.
about.company: To be a small, secure and reliable pool is the reason for XSEC to exist. We are proud member of Cardano Single Pool Alliance https://singlepoolalliance.net/. We strongly believe that there have to be as many small nodes as possible for the future to be really decentralized.
